name: SWIFT, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Imposition of sanctions on financial messaging services with respect to institutions in other countries, including H.R.1644, the "Korean Interdiction and Modernization of Sanctions Act;" and S.1591, the "Otto Warmbier Banking Restrictions Involving North Korea Act of 2017."  Issues related to cyber security.
